original: Paccuppanno hetu dhammo naatītassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Paccuppanno
hetu dhammo naanāgatassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Paccuppanno hetu
dhammo naatītassa nahetussa ca naanāgatassa nahetussa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena
paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā cha, anantare tīṇi
